text:
Cristiano Ronaldo has a long list of affairs but he is not married yet. The most prominent among them was Irina shayk and his current girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez.

His affairs started during his Manchester days. The former Manchester United star became a father at the age of 25 when his first child, Cristiano Jr, was born in June 2010.

Ronaldo has never publicly revealed the identity of his son's mother. He paid a huge amount to his girlfriend to keep the identity. He named his son Cristiano Ronaldo Jr. He has vowed to reveal the truth to his son about his mother’s story when he’s older.

He has had many girlfriends though, the most popular one was model Irina Shayk.

The Portugal captain announced in June 2017 that he had fathered twins via a surrogate mother in United States.

He named them Eva and Matteo.

In August 2016 Cristiano Ronaldo met Georgina Rodriguez. Since then the couple has been dating.

In July 2017 Ronaldo announced that he and his Spanish girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez were expecting their first baby together. Georgina Rodriguez gave birth to baby daughter Alana Martina on November 12, 2017.
title: Who is cristiano ronaldo's real wife?
